title: box-it-app
description: Interactive MERN stack Box packing app, where users can save and track box or luggage content during a move or travel
technologies: HTML, Bootstrap, JS, node, mongodb, mongoose & deployed with netlify, features include user authentication, user collaboration, and crud functionality

title: fun-with-gpt-3
description: Interactive front-end project, which uses a third-party API, OpenAI api, to return content based on user input
technologies: React, Bootstrap, JS, node, deployed with GitHub Pages, features include user input, api call.

title: my-adventure-app
description: Interactive full-stack crud app, built as a social media platform
technologies: HTML, Bootstrap, JS, handlebars, node, mysql, sequelize & deployed with Heroku, features include user authentication, user collaboration, and crud functionality
